txt.en: 'Ah, I knew it! A shade lurks in the ice! We were being watched! We were not going mad at all! I thank you for investigating and putting my mind at ease.'
The frozen waters Kúzun speaks of can found just west of Hlídborg in Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should investigate the frozen waters for Kúzun.
A darkness pulls at you as the shade known as Angithanam appears!
Kúzun can be found at Leitstáth.\n\nYou should talk to Kúzun.
The Zhélruka, Kúzun, is certain that something watches those who wander the rocky slopes of Câr Bronach.
The frozen waters Kúzun speaks of can found just west of Hlídborg in Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should investigate the frozen waters for Kúzun.

'I find something is amiss upon these rocky slopes. I can feel it upon the paths, as if something is watching me. I feel it, only for a moment, then it is gone. Have you felt it as well? Yes, there is a cold shiver, even when the wind is calm. There is almost a voice, almost a vision, then nothing.\n\n'I believe it has something to do with these strange lakes of ice scattered about the valley. Will you investigate one that is near for me? I would like to be certain that I am not the only one feeling this way. I do hope the hills are not making me mad.'
Investigate the frozen waters for Kúzun
